title: The Quakers art of courtship, or, The Yea-and-nay academy of complements calculated for the meridian of the Bull-and-Mouth and may indifferently serve the brethren of the wind-mill order for noddification in any part of will-a-wisp land / by the author of Teagueland jests.
author: Author of Teagueland jests.
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by most booksellers,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
